Title: Enacts the "limited equity cooperative insurance captive authorization and county cap act"
Summary: Enacts the "limited equity cooperative insurance captive authorization and county cap act" to enable limited equity cooperatives in the state of New York to establish insurance captives to enhance their ability to manage risks, improve insurance coverage, and promote financial stability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to enacting the "limited equity cooperative insurance captive authorization and county cap act"
